#### **Notice Description**
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for optometry services to provide essential optometry treatments and services to offenders in Quebec institutions. The CSC wishes to obtain optometry services to provide optometry treatments and services in compliance with federal and provincial legislation and standards.

**Scope of Work**

* Provide optometry services to inmates on an as and when requested basis
* Perform general eye examinations to rule out pathology and/or diagnose disorders of the eye
* Comply with federal and provincial legislation and standards, provincial and national guidelines, practice standards and CSC Policy/Guidelines

**Evaluation Criteria**

Bidders must complete a Technical Proposal and a Financial Proposal. The evaluation criteria will be based on the following factors:

* Technical Proposal: 60%
	+ Experience and qualifications of the optometrist
	+ Contract management and administration expertise
	+ Ability to provide optometry services in compliance with federal and provincial legislation and standards
* Financial Proposal: 40%
	+ Accuracy and completeness of the financial proposal
	+ Compliance with all financial conditions and requirements
